languages.text: "Я выделю тебе угодья, Маражай. Отсек нижней палубы. Делай там все, что тебе заблагорассудится, но не смей выходить за их пределы во время варп-перелетов".

traits.locale_text: "Я выделю тебе угодья, Маражай. Нижнюю палубу или целый отсек. Делай там все, что тебе заблагорассудится — они твои".

languages.text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."
languages.original_text: "Я выделю тебе угодья, Маражай. Отсек нижней палубы. Делай там все, что тебе заблагорассудится, но не смей выходить за их пределы во время варп-перелетов".

traits.locale_text: "I will give you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever you heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."
"I will give you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever you heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."
"I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."
"I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."
"I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

languages.text: « Je vais vous aménager un terrain de chasse personnel, Marazhai. Dans une baie des ponts inférieurs. Vous pourrez y faire ce que bon vous semble, mais vous avez interdiction d'en sortir pendant les sauts Warp. »
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous aménager un terrain de chasse personnel, Marazhai. Dans une baie des ponts inférieurs. Vous pourrez y faire ce que bon vous semble, mais vous avez interdiction d'en sortir pendant les sauts Warp.

languages.text: 「マラズハイ、お前に狩猟場を与えよう。下層デッキのベイだ。そこでなら好きなことをしても構わないが、ワープジャンプ中はそこから出てはならない」
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイ、お前に狩猟場を与えよう。下層デッキのベイだ。そこでなら好きなことをしても構わないが、ワープジャンプ中はそこから出てはならない」

languages.text: “我可以给你一片狩猎场，玛拉斋。我把底层甲板的一片区域分给你，你在那里想干什么都行，但在亚空间跳跃期间，你不准离开那片区域。””
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: “我可以给你一片狩猎场，玛拉斋。我把底层甲板的一片区域分给你，你在那里想干什么都行，但在亚空间跳跃期间，你不准离开那片区域。””

languages.text: "Ich gewähre Euch ein Jagdrevier, Marazhai. Ein Modul auf den Unterdecks. Dort könnt Ihr tun, was Euer Herz begehrt, doch Ihr dürft seine Grenzen während Warpsprüngen nicht verlassen."
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gewähre Euch ein Jagdrevier, Marazhai. Ein Modul auf den Unterdecks. Dort könnt Ihr tun, was Euer Herz begehrt, doch Ihr dürft seine Grenzen während Warpsprüngen nicht verlassen."

languages.text: «Te concedo un territorio de caza, Marazhai. Uno de los muelles de las cubiertas inferiores. Harás lo que te venga en gana allí abajo, pero no debes abandonar sus confines cuando efectuemos saltos de disformidad».
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: «Te concedo un territorio de caza, Marazhai. Uno de los muelles de las cubiertas inferiores. Harás lo que te venga en gana allí abajo, pero no debes abandonar sus confines cuando efectuemos saltos a la disformidad».

languages.text: "Sana bir av sahası tahsis ediyorum Marazhai. Alt güvertelerde bir bölme. Orada canın ne isterse yapabilirsin ama öte sıçramalar sırasında oranın dışına çıkmayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "I shall grant you hunting grounds, Marazhai. A bay on the lower decks. You can do whatever your heart desires down there, but you are not to leave its bounds during warp jumps."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bir av sahası tahsis ediyorum Marazhai. Alt güvertelerde bir bölme. Orada canın ne isterse yapabilirsin ama öte sıçramalar sırasında oranın dışına çıkmayacaksın."
